text: Yvonne Hiller, who has been arrested and charged with the Kraft shooting of her co - workers at Kraft Foods yesterday evening has been revealed to be a Muslim who was very spiritual. At this point it is unclear if the shooting had anything to do with the approaching anniversary of the 9 - 11 attacks on America by radical members of the Muslim faith. However it does seem odd that Hiller had a. 357 Magnum in her car, which is what she used. That ’ s a pretty heavy - duty gun. NBC Philadelphia has interviewed another co - worker of hers, Kenneth Dorsey, and he said he had talked with her about her Muslim faith and even wished her happy Ramadan.
title: Yvonne Hiller, Accused in Kraft Shooting, Is A Muslim.
